title: Call of Duty Has a New Battle Royale - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.09.20
description:
Hurry to http://upstart.com/kfgames to find out how low your Upstart rate is!

To get your new wireless plan for just 15 bucks a month,
and get the plan shipped to your door for FREE, go to http://
mintmobile.com/games.

Get 10% off your first order and free shipping when you use promo code games only at http://brooklinen.com

 Blessing and Tim discuss Call of Duty: Warzone 

Time Stamps - 
00:05:30 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
Mohammed Mohammed, Drew Gardiner, Black Jack, The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan
The Roper Report   -
00:06:20 - A NEW CALL OF DUTY IS LAUNCHING TOMORROW
00:24:40 - Cyberpunk has revealed the look for its feminine protagonist - Joseph Knoop @ IGN
00:27:30 - With the industry trying to shed it's bro culture skin, what other changes would you like to see from your favorite devs that would move the needle further? - Best Friends Q: Frank Furterr
00:30:00 - Fallout 76 Broke its VO Budget - Hayley Williams @ GameSpot
00:35:45 - Mojang and EA cancel live events in response to COVID-19 - Haydn Taylor @ GIBiz
00:37:52 - SXSW has been cancelled - Natalie Jarvey @ The Hollywood Reporter
00:41:50 - Do you expect a new Sonic game there? - Best Friends Q: Nano Biologist
00:45:42 -  UPSTART
00:47:05 -  MINT MOBILE
00:48:28 -  BROOKLINEN
00:50:20 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:52:00 - Are there women in games that you personally look up to or aspire to emulate in your work at Kinda Funny? - Jamie S
00:55:31 - "Spell your name using only video game titles" - Charles Jakobsen
01:01:29 - Could you see this show flopping and being a 1-2 season long affair? - Michael Knight
01:04:04 - You‘re Wrong
This Week’s Hosts:
TUESDAY: Blessing and Imran
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Whitta
THURSDAY: Greg and Blessing
FRIDAY: Greg and Blessing

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
